resources.string: "Message calibration has failed %1$s times in succession, the possible cause may be: \u0009\u0009 1. Your carrierâ€™s information is incorrectly set. \u0009\u0009 2. Current network is disconnected or unstable. \u0009\u0009 3. Calibration server is busy. \u0009\u0009 4. The mobile signal is weak for current location. \u0009\u0009 5. The phone account has insufficient balance or no service available. Please check the reason for failure, then try to calibrate again."
